title: Type face used for taschen logo
content:
I'm looking for the typeface that's used for the taschen logo  
It's sans serif but it has slight human touch to it the horizontal lines are slightly thinner then the vertical lines  
but it's nice and subtle. It could be customised, but maybe someone can help me out.  
Thanks in advance.

RJ

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Taschen typo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130503084636/http:/typophile.com/files/Taschen%20typo_0.png) | 39.27 KB |
author: RJH

comments.content:
Hi RJ

The TASCHEN typeface is a bespoke design and is therefore not available to buy anywhere I'm afraid to say.

Glad you like it though.

Mark best  
PR Manager  
TASCHEN UK
